fixes.name: Shipping Cost Estimate
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level multiplication ([Quantity]*5) to a DAX calculated column using the table-qualified column reference.

fixes.name: Sales After Discont
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level discount calculation ([Sales]-[Sales]*[Discount]) to a DAX calculated column using table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: Net Revenue
fixes.dax_expression: 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales After Discont] - 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Shipping Cost Estimate]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level subtraction of two calculated fields to a DAX calculated column and qualified all column references with the table name.
